resources.string: We will show you relevent opportunities in search results & send you interships/jobs alerts based on your preferences.
Facing an issue with an employer? Report suspicious behaviour

Let us know if an employer has: 

- Asked for money in the form of security deposit,laptop fee, etc. 

- Made offensive comments. 

- Posted incorrect job description or stipend/salary. 

- Refused to issue an internship certificate or pay the promised stipend. 

- Tried to get social media followers, app downloads or any other free work done, under the guise of assessment.
Whenever you apply to an internship/job, this is the resume that the employer will see. Always make sure it is upto date.
You have not applied any internships/jobs till now please apply before its fills out.
You have not posted any internships/jobs till now please post to see details.
You have not done activity till now so, there is no notification available right now.
Your application has been shared with the employer who may get in touch if they like it.\nMeanwhile,apply to more internship to improve your chances.
Congratulations! Your application has been selected pack your gadjets to work
We are sorry you did not make it. We suggest you apply to more internships to improve your chances.
Your Internship/Job has been shared with the interns who may apply if they like it.\nMeanwhile, You can post if any other intership/job avaible in your company
